Reason

controller.xml is located at ‘src/main/java’

Solution1

move it to src/main/resources.

Solution2

Add this code to maven.

<build>  
    <resources>  
        <resource>  
            <directory>src/main/java</directory>  
            <includes>  
                <include>**/*.xml</include>  
            </includes>  
        </resource>  
    </resources>  
</build>
